item.title: In the Beginning...
item.description: “In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. The same was in the beginning with God.”" â€” John 1: 1-14 KJV I was inspired to have a blog for a while now. But in the process I also wanted to personalize it by not being bound by a certain internet platform. I like the idea of freedom and have been tired of certain restraints, that’s why I chose to do it this way.
